products.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Mid Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The ultra-modern genesis plain luxe mid grey vertical blind is the perfect finishing touch for a sophisticated scheme. Neutral, yet elegant, its high-quality hue and durable dimout fabric would make an excellent refining detail wherever you use it. Add some minimalist grace by pairing this colour with creams and complementary greys, or contrast with more colourful centrepieces for maximum effect.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Steel 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Any sunny space will benefit from the flexibility of a vertical blind, and with this smart, dark grey design, you can show your signature style. The genesis blackout luxe steel vertical blind is fitted with vertical slats made from a blackout material. These slats can be effectively tilted to lower light levels or block sunlight completely whatever time of day. products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Natural 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The genesis blackout luxe natural vertical blind is a stunning addition for any family home or office. The adjustability of the vertical slats is perfect for creating your ideal light levels at any time of day, resulting in a peaceful environment that is conducive for both work and relaxation. The blackout slats are made from practical waterproof material and are presented in this warm and versatile natural tone.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Graphite 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Chic and contemporary, the genesis blackout luxe graphite vertical blind is sure to make an impact in any room. This highly practical design featuring vertical slats offers you complete control over glare and light filtration in your space, plus in this smart graphite colour, it looks really attractive too. The durable vertical slats boast blackout qualities so this blind can be enjoyed in many areas of your home.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Cloud 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The genesis blackout luxe cloud vertical blind is both streamlined and graceful so you can add some subtle contemporary style to your window space. This practical vertical blind will prove useful in a range of rooms and offers you complete flexibility thanks to the tilting vertical slats and blackout material. Coloured in a soft blue-grey hue, this vertical blind is easy to incorporate in both traditional and more minimalist interiors.
